HomePage.title: Welcome to Migreen
HomePage.subtitle: Your personalized companion for migraine relief through green light therapy. Track your sessions, gain insights, and find what works best for you.

DashboardPage.title: Your Migreen Dashboard
DashboardPage.subtitle: Start a new therapy session or review your progress.
DashboardPage.startTherapyDescription: Begin your green light therapy session to find relief.
DashboardPage.viewHistoryDescription: Analyze past sessions to discover patterns.
DashboardPage.aiRecommendationsDescription: Get personalized suggestions to optimize your therapy.
DashboardPage.quickOverviewContent: Your recent activity and key stats will appear here.

HistoryPage.title: Session History & Analytics
HistoryPage.description: Review your past therapy sessions and analyze trends.
HistoryPage.noSessionsMessage: No sessions found matching your criteria. Try adjusting filters or log a new session.
HistoryPage.confirmDeleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the session from your history.
HistoryPage.sessionDeletedDescription: The session has been removed from your history.

RecommendationsPage.title: AI Personalized Therapy Insights
RecommendationsPage.description: Get AI-powered suggestions to optimize your therapy regimen based on your session history.
RecommendationsPage.sessionsRecorded: {count, plural, =0 {0 sessions recorded.} =1 {1 session recorded.} other {# sessions recorded.}}
RecommendationsPage.disclaimer: These are AI-generated suggestions. Always consult with a healthcare professional for medical advice.
RecommendationsPage.moreDataNeededDescription: The AI needs at least 3 completed therapy sessions to provide meaningful insights. Keep logging your sessions to unlock personalized recommendations!
RecommendationsPage.errorMinSessions: At least 3 therapy sessions are needed to generate personalized recommendations. Please log more sessions.

SettingsPage.title: Application Settings
SettingsPage.notificationDescription: Reminder notifications are a planned feature.

FeedbackPage.title: Session Feedback
FeedbackPage.description: Log how you feel after the therapy session. Actual duration: {duration} minutes.
FeedbackPage.errorMissingData: Session data missing. Please start a new session.
FeedbackPage.errorSave: Could not save session. Critical data missing.
FeedbackPage.notesPlaceholder: Any changes noticed, side effects, etc.
FeedbackPage.saveToastDescription: Your therapy session has been logged.

SessionPage.importantTipContent: Keep this screen active. Do not navigate away or lock your device. Relax and focus on the green light.

StartTherapyPage.title: Start New Therapy Session
StartTherapyPage.description: Log your current symptoms to tailor your session.
StartTherapyPage.areaError: Please select an affected area if pain intensity is greater than 0.
StartTherapyPage.durationAlertDescription: Based on your pain level, we recommend a {duration}-minute session. You can adjust this below. Max: 90 minutes.
StartTherapyPage.notesPlaceholder: Any additional details, e.g., specific food eaten, activities...

GlobalError.title: Application Error
GlobalError.description: We're sorry, something went wrong on our end. Please try again.
